S

saveButton - Static variable in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
the save button which will save the canvas through serialization (not yet implemented)
saveCanvas() - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Canvas
saves through serialization the Canvas object (bytes, not text)
setFilled(boolean) - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Canvas
sets the current and future fill property of the shapes
setIsCircle(boolean) - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Canvas
sets the current and future shapes to be circles or rectangles
setupButtons() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
sets up the buttons' functionalities
setupCheckboxButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the fill checkbox, having it set the canvas' future shapes to be filled
setupCircleRadioButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the fill rectangle radio button, having it set the canvas' future shapes to be circles
setupConfigurationPanel() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
sets up the configuration panel
setupExitButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the exit button, therefore making the program close itself when the button clicked
setupLoadButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the load button, therefore when the load button is clicked, the static method loadCanvas from class Canvas is called in order to load an Canvas object from a file
setupRadioButtons() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
sets up the group of radio buttons
setupRectangleRadioButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the fill rectangle radio button, having it set the canvas' future shapes to be rectangles
setupResetButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the reset button, therefore when the button is clicked, the canvas will be deleted
setupSaveButton() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
it configures the save button, therefore when the button is clicked, the Canvas object will be saved to a file on the user's Desktop
setupSizeField() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
When an action is performed (enter is pressed after introducing a new number), the shape's size will change.
setupTheControlPanel() - Static method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
sets up the control panel
setWidthAndHeight(int, int) - Method in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Canvas
A way to set the new width and height of the ellipse.
shapeHistory - Variable in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Canvas
an arraylist to remember the order in which the shapes of the objects have been painted (rectangles or circles)
sizeField - Static variable in class ro.uaic.info.georgeboghez.compulsory.Main
the text field which holds the specified size of an ellipse (press enter after writing a number)
